person.persName: Thomas A. Franklin (Clerk of Grant Co. Ct.)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, farmer and County Court Clerk. Virginia native. Married Sallie A. Franklin. Farmer in Grant County in 1860. Appointed postmaster of Stateleys Run, Kentucky, on November 12, 1861. Clerk of the Grant County Court in 1863.
